name: Dimension Beats
description:
Dimensions Beats is a rythm-based-action game made for the Pygame Community Summer Jam 2022 with the theme Dimensions!

Each level represents a shape with a particular dimension, in ascending order. First a point, then a line, and then a triangle, and so on! The enemy launches bullets synced with the soundtracks' beats. You must avoid them in order to progress to the next level.

For now we have implemented only 3 Levels due to the short time within the jam. But, we intend to develop it into a Bigger project in the future, so if you liked this game, please rate this game for the jam, and provide us with your feedback.

Your feedback is valuable as it would help us in improving things for the final version.

Included in this page is a Web Version made using pygame WASM, and also a downloadable executable file (windows only).

Thanks for checking out the game!

Source code for the game can be found here
